Class PatientDB

java.lang.Object
sc2002.repositories.PatientDB
public class PatientDB extends Object
Provides database operations related to patient information, including retrieval, updates, and creation of new patients.

      public PatientDB()

  • Method Details

    • getPatientDetails

      public static MedicalRecord getPatientDetails(String hospitalID) throws IOException
      Retrieves the basic details of a patient based on their hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the patient.
      Returns:
      MedicalRecord object containing the patient's details, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue accessing the file.

    • getPatientContactDetails

      public static ContactInformation getPatientContactDetails(String hospitalID) throws IOException
      Retrieves the contact information of a patient based on their hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the patient.
      Returns:
      ContactInformation object containing the patient's contact details, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue accessing the file.

    • updateContactInformation

      public static void updateContactInformation(String hospitalID, String email, int phoneNumber)
      Updates the contact information of a patient.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the patient.
      email - The new email address of the patient.
      phoneNumber - The new phone number of the patient.

    • createNewPatient

      public static String createNewPatient(String patientName, String patientDOB, String gender, String bloodType, int phoneNumber, String email) throws IOException
      Creates a new patient entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      patientName - The name of the patient.
      patientDOB - The date of birth of the patient in "YYYY-MM-DD" format.
      gender - The gender of the patient ("M" or "F").
      bloodType - The blood type of the patient.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the patient.
      email - The email address of the patient.
      Returns:
      The newly assigned patient ID.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue accessing the file.
